```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(rstanarm)
library(readr)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false
NBA_Data <- read_csv("data/NBA-2022-2023-Data.csv", col_types = cols(
  Player = col_character(),
  Team = col_character(),
  Positions = col_character()
  )
) |> 
  filter(Team == "CHI") |>
    filter(`GP` > 10)
```

```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false
fit_obj <- stan_glm(data = NBA_Data, 
                    formula = `FG%` ~ 1, 
                    family = gaussian, 
                    refresh = 0,
                    seed = 9)

fit_obj
```
